title: ICICI Securities defends delisting: Claims shareholder democracy in action
description: In its reply, the country’s second-largest private-sector lender ICICI Bank’s affiliate firm argued that the applicants have no locus standi whatsoever, to file the applications or raise any objection.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
